page.title: 13Woodham Ferrers old folk 2
page.content: My schooldays were nice and very similar to what it is now. I worked in a leather factory. People were very poor. People were very trusting when I was young and we never locked our doors. They are buildinga a lot now and taking up much of the countryside. I watch televison buty I belong to a religion which says I must not watch war films, crime or any violence. I am a Jehova Witness. I like plain everyday food and do not drink anything alcoholic. Eastham old folks home was originally a rectory but during the second world war children were brought from East Ham in London for holidays. After the war it became an old folks home. It has about 30 residents living in extreme comfort and with complete freedom to movement. Their every need is catered for with ample staff to look after them.
